name: Cube Wars Strike 3D
description:
Cube Wars Strike 3D is counter strike style gaming experience on your device!

Enjoy the smooth touch controls and play the exciting cross-platform first person shooter against enemies!

Cube Wars Strike game features:
- standart counter-strike 3d style gaming!
- smooth and responsive touch controls!
- death match mode!
- several guns such as grenade, ak47 and rpg!
- big maps!
- cube craft graphics style!
